title: Bug 120315 - Display property 'none' not taking effect in new PDF emitter
OB: When the display property of an item is set to 'none' in the new PDF emitter, the label does not disappear as expected.
EB: In the PDF preview, the label should disappear when the display property is set to 'none'.
SR:
1. Open the new PDF emitter.
2. Set the display property of an item to 'none'.
3. Preview the PDF.
4. Verify that the label is still visible, instead of disappearing.
